Package com.comp2042.interfaces

package com.comp2042.interfaces
This package defines the interfaces used in the game components.

This package includes:

  • Board – defines methods for managing the game board.
  • Brick – represents a Tetris piece's structure.
  • BrickGenerator – defines the current brick and the next bricks./li>
  • InputEventListener – handles user input events and translates them into game actions.

Classes in this package are implemented by logic or controller classes to ensure consistent behavior across the game.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.comp2042
     
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    Board
    This interface defines the operations for controlling bricks, managing the game state, and retrieving game information.
    Brick
    This interface defines a brick and its shape configurations.
    BrickGenerator
    This interface provides methods to get a new active brick for the game.
    InputEventListener
    This interface handles the player input events and translates them into game actions.
